views.markdown:
-Compatible with IG 10.32 -Added button to easily access media and and stories vault -Compatible with IG 10.27 -Better navigation from full/minimal feed
-Fixed videos playing in background when going from full to minimal feed
-Fix crash on 10.6 when using minimal view

-Compatible with Instagram 10.4.1
-You can now access stories while in minimal view
-Upload photos to stories from as long ago as possible
-You can now mark stories read manually
-You can now switch the grid using a much more simple drop down. You can also completely turn off the custom grid feature
-Fixed crash when deleting own stories
-Re-organized settings
-Added option to remove unfollow confirmation prompt
-Added "Follows You" status
-Fixed custom notifications on iOS 10
-Fixed crash on latest Instagram when viewing posts
-Added ability to save DM stories
-Autosave DM Stories
-Added selective autosave
-Added Follows Back Status
-Fixed muted users selection
-Block Screenshot notifications from being sent for DM stories
-Various fixes for Instagram 9.7 and more fixes coming soon -Added back minimal feed -Compatible with Instagram 8.4 -Fixes for Instagram 8.0 version: 1.6r-65
changes:
- Fixed downloads on Instagram 7.20
-Fix crash on Instagram v 7.16
-Re-Gram now keeps caption again
-Full screen works properly now and should not cause random crashes
-Fixed crash in settings for some users
-Timestamp now works again
-Works on latest IG and compatible with latest uasharedtools -Compatible with IG 7.16

-Due to Parse.com being discontinued by Facebook I have had to re-write my backend services as such this is a major update. If you have purchased ad-removal before please make sure to login again from “++ Settings -> Ad Removal Settings”
-Compatible with 7.14.0
-You can now mute users
-Ad removal settings are much more organized and hopefully the issue of ads not being removed after submitting payment are fixed :) -Compiled for 32/64 bit on iOS 9

-Fixed a crash users were experiencing due to spoofing settings
-You can now autoselect highest quality when downloading
-You can now enable sounds for all notifications


New Features:
-You can now manage multiple Instagram accounts.
-You can now disable read receipts from being sent in DM
-You can now download images and videos in various resolutions
-You can now store saved media in custom albums or in a media vault inside Instagram.
-You can now spoof your account to be verified

Bug Fixes:
-When you spoof stats it will only apply to you
-Refer to updated depiction for new features
-This version works best on Instagram v7.5 and up

Removed custom number of rows for now since it was broken by Instagram. -Fixed crash when click on like from minimal view
-Support for new Instagram formats: when you download an image you now get the full resolution.
-Compatible with Instagram 7.5
-You can now save media from your own profile feed
-Various bug fixes

-Support for IG version 7.0.1 -Instagram 6.9.1 compatability version: 1.3r-1
changes:
-Compatible with Instagram version 6.6.x
-Added ability to change the main feed to look like the explore feed and to select the number of columns
Updated to work with Instagram 6.5.0 -HQ photos in explore view if you have set 3 or less rows
-You can now saved media from the explore view or from messages
-Added paypal as a donation method

-Settings are now located inside the Instagram Profile settings
-Added fullscreen mode
-Added passcode lock which you can use with TouchID
-Added option to donate to remove ads
-A few bug fixes :)

-You can now hide comments from feed view
-You can now hide bio info in profile view
-You can now set a custom number of rows per column in explore view

Please go to Settings and then Instagram++ to change enable these features. More changes coming soon.
